chapter.title: Introduction to &THIS.PLATFORM; &MANAGEMENT.PLATFORM;
chapter.para: &THIS.PLATFORM; &MANAGEMENT.PLATFORM; is an application which lets an administrator user interact with the SLEE in order to perform management functions.

The console is a J2EE compliant web-based application deployed in the running instance of Apache Tomcat inside JBoss AS. An administrator can connect to this console via HTTP through a common web browser.

&THIS.PLATFORM; &MANAGEMENT.PLATFORM; allows the administrator to perform most common management operations, such as deployment and installation of JAIN SLEE Deployable Units, JAIN SLEE Component Management and Configuration, etc. as well as some monitoring task such as observing and inspecting JAIN SLEE Activities.
